page.title: 10INFORMATION SYSTEMS C/SIDE
page.content: IN THE DISTRICT OF COMMONSIDE A MOBILE LIBRARY CALLS EVERY TWO WEEKS TO ALL HOUSES-UNLESS ASKED NOT TO CALL. THIS IS A WALK-IN VAN WITH SHELVES OF BOOKS FOR READERS TO CHOOSE THEIR OWN. THE VAN-DRIVER-LIBRARIAN WILL OBTAIN THE BOOKS, NOT CARRIED ON THE VAN, ON REQUEST AND WILL BRING THESE ON THE NEXT VISIT. THE MOBILE LIBRARY VAN DISPLAYS NOTICES OF EVENTS, MANY HANDED IN BY READERS FOR PUBLICITY. BORDERS REGIONAL COUNCIL, WHO OWN THE VAN AND LIBRARY SERVICE, ISSUE NOTICES AND LEAFLETS FOR DISPLAY e.g. TOURIST INFORMATION;PLACES OF HISTORICAL INTEREST;SPORTS;PONY-TREKKING;LOCAL WALKS;ACTIVITIES SUCH AS FISHING,CYCLING, SKI-ING ETC. HEALTH POSTERS AND DATE FOR BLOOD DONORS.
